question:
A friend from another country is moving to your city for work. He / she has asked you for advice about living in your city.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter

suggest an interesting part of the city to live indescribe the public transport in your citysay how your friend can meet new people there
text: How are you doing? I hope you and your lovely family are safe and sound. It's amazing hearing that you've been employed in Tak company. Have you known that its headquarter is in our neighbourhood? Here are some pieces of advice for you during your stay:

First of all, I think you are going to rent a flat for your accommodation. I don't know how much you are going to pay, but I suggest you find  one in the Gisha neighbourhood. Not only it's close to your workplace, but also you are able to enjoy the lively atmosphere  there. There are lots of cafes with brilliant vibes, especially board game cafes.

Fortunately, this city is extremely convenient. You can reach even furthermost parts of the city as easy as 1,2,3 thanks to its efficient public transportation system. However, it is necessary to have a ticket card, you can find it easily in mero stations.

You definitely need to make friends here, gyms are the best places to meet new people. You can find a wide variety of people there and you can start a conversation with them as a piece of cake. people here are warm and friendly and you won't find it difficult to socialise here.
I'm waiting for your call when you arrive.
